text:
Reminder Theme fields.json for themes created before July 27th will start being validated in the Design Manager August 17th.

What that means is that if your fields.json contains any errors they will now be highlighted in the design manager, and fixing those errors will be required to be able to publish the file.

Locally when trying to upload a themeâ€™s fields.json with errors you will see error messages.

You can test ahead of time to ensure that your themes will not display these errors - see <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/theme-field-validation|changelog >announcement for details.
